Package org.tantalum

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlatformUtils.HttpConn
    A convenience class abstracting HTTP connection operations between different platforms.
    Workable
    A task to be completed on the Worker thread Conceptually this is the same as the Runnable interface, but helps to keep clear which objects objects are intended for Worker threads and which for other threads such as the event dispatch thread.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncTask
    An implementation of Android's AsyncTask pattern for cross platform application on J2ME and Android.
    PlatformUtils
    PlatformUtils aids in cross-platform development by starting and stopping the background Worker threads when the program starts and stops.
    Task
    A Task is the base unit of work in the Tantalum toolset.
    UITask
    A unit of work which, once the Task.doInBackground() is completed on a background Worker thread, should update the user interface from the UI Thread in onPostExecute().
    Worker
    A generic worker thread.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CancellationException
    A queued Task had Task.cancel() called on it before it could complete execution.
    ExecutionException
    A queued Task blew an error during execution.
    TimeoutException
    This is thrown when a Task.join() operation takes longer than the specified timeout period to complete.
